posts.title: Distance to Proxima Centauri
posts.content: The Proxima Centauri system is the closest to our Solar System.  It's 4.24 light-years away.

posts.title: Definition of a Year
posts.content: A planet's year is the time it takes to go once around its parent star.

posts.title: Turtles are cool!
posts.content: I like turtles.  They are cool.  Especially teenage, mutant, ninja ones.

posts.title: My first blog post!
posts.content: I have a dog, and his name is Bruce.  This is the content of my first blog post.
